DataElement.preferredName: EPIC-CP Questionnaire Urinary Irritation/Obstruction Symptom Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Urinary Irritation/Obstructive Symptom Score for EPIC-CP.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice Questionnaire EPIC-CP - Urinary Irritation/Obstruction Symptom Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale developed by Chang et al in 2011, which is used to measure urinary incontinence, urinary irritation, and the bowel, sexual and hormonal health related quality of life in patients with prostate cancer. This instrument contains 16 items._Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice (EPIC-CP) Urinary irritation/obstruction symptom score.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice Questionnaire

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Clinicians: Add the answers from questions 5a-5c to calculate the Urinary Irritation/Obstruction Symptom Score (out of 12)
